name: EasyLogger
description: A library to do serial logging the easy and lightweight way. Log easily in your sketch at different loglevels. The output is presented nicely with a timestamp down to the milliseconds. Even if your are worried about sketch size, you can still Leave logging statements in your sketch. When you change loglevels your log-statements will be compiled out.
keywords: log, logging, logger,loglevel, debug, serial, easylogger, AVR, ESP32, ESP8266
